snippet: From jail, a career pickpocket offered an inside look into his specialty — picking wallets out of women’s purses in crowded bars and quickly putting them to use.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes habits and strategies of Cory Christopher of the Bronx, who made his living stealing wallets and purses in crowded Manhattan bars and then using credit cards to buy gift cards; Christopher is facing a number of grand larceny charges.
lead_paragraph: From jail, a career pickpocket offered an inside look into his specialty — picking wallets out of women’s purses in crowded bars and quickly putting them to use.

headline.main: A Thief Tells How He Steals, and Where He Likes to Eat
headline.print_headline: A Thief Tells How He Steals, and Where He Likes to Eat
